directions: Toss peaches with lemon juice in medium bowl. Add preserves, sugar, and cardamom and toss. Let stand 10 minutes to allow flavors to blend. (Can be made 4 hours ahead; cover and refrigerate.) Add raspberries and toss gently.
ingredients: 1 3/4 pounds peaches, peeled, halved, pitted, sliced
title: Spiced Peaches and Raspberries
